728665f-b.title: Richmond: Castleton Avenue - Webster Avenue
728665f-b.text:
(1)
Castleton Ave., north side, between Webster Ave. and Pine
Street, showing the main building of the Staten Island ~Sospital.
It was formerly known as the S.R. Smith Infirmary and General
Hospital. The view is in an easterly direction.
About 1905.
By Mulford Simonson.
From Staten Island Museum Collection through P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A closer view of the same.
About 1905.
By Mulford Simonson.
From Staten Island Museu Collection through P. L. Sperr.
(3) The Same, at a later date.
About 1910
By MulIord Simonson
From P,L.Sperr Collection
728665f-b.folder: Castleton Avenue & Webster Avenue, Staten Island, NY
